headline: Here’s Why ServiceNow (NOW) Was Among Piper Sandler’s Top Picks For 2026
summary: ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) is one of the 15 software stocks with the highest upside potential. According to Piper Sandler’s January 5, 2026, outlook for Security and Infrastructure Software stocks, the stock is among the firm’s top 5 picks for 2026. Analyst Rob Owens and his team said that we remain cautiously optimistic for 2026, as […]
